Description:
20 ACRES WITH POTENTIAL
20 acres within the Urban Growth Boundary this property operated as a winery/restaurant until recently. Approx 10 acres of grapes, a three bedroom residence plus a purpose built cellar door style restaurant or function room. Some works are required but the basic structure is there. The grapes are a mix of varieties established for a number of years. The residence is ranch style with three bedrooms, a main L shaped lounge dining room with solid fuel heater plus kitchen and amenities. A rear pergola is next to a fenced inground swimming pool and cabana.
The "cellar" has a large well equipped servery with an open plan ground floor leading to a mezzanine and also to a raised covered timber deck overlooking the vines.
Add long term subdivision potential this property offers many options. Utilise the structure as winery, redevelop as a horse property. Create your own business and or lifestyle.
For further information or an opportunity to inspect, ring now.
Ross Neilson : 0418 331 696

Description:
3 Acres 2 Homes Development Potential
Approx 3 acres, located within revised urban growth
Boundary, offering great investment potential.
Spacious B/V homestead offering 4 bedrooms, huge
lounge with vaulted ceilings and open fire place. Formal dining room, built in bar, split system heating & cooling, dishwasher and loads more. Also features great fully self contained unit with formal lounge, dining area, fully equipped kitchen, heating and cooling, laundry and bathroom. With separate drive way this makes an ideal property for in-law accommodation or rent out for extra income potential.
Out side under large verandas you will enjoy glorious views of rolling green lawns, established trees, paddocks for horses with new fencing and fenced swimming pool. Plenty of room for cars with double carport and great 4 car work shed. A rare offering for great lifestyle property with strategic location for future development.

Under Offer / Under Contract
Are you looking for a family home with the quiet country lifestyle? This is it. This home has room to accommodate the whole family and still give everyone room to move. The home is comprised of 4 bedrooms master with semi ensuite and WIR, 3 open plan living areas, single lock up garage and a large covered outdoor entertaining area just a step off the in-ground pool with spa. The home is packed with features some of which include new laminate kitchen, 1000m2 block (approx) and a variety of shedding just to mention a few. Opportunities like this don't come up very often, don't miss out and book your inspection today.

Description:
Tranquil Dual Living on One Hectare
Situated in peaceful Clyde just minutes from Berwick and its wide ranging services, this parklike landscaped oasis offers outstanding accommodation for the large family. It comprises an Australian homestead style main residence offering generous living areas, four bedrooms, solid Blackwood kitchen, lock-up garage, and landscaped entertainment area. An adjoining indoor solar heated inground pool offers low maintenance family entertainment. A contemporary styled 2 bedroom "studio-villa" is also featured; it would make ideal inlaw, teenager accommodation or suit a home based business.
Sprawling landscaped grounds complete with ornamental lake afford privacy, seclusion and room to indulge your family's pursuits.

Description:
A Masterpiece on 10 Acres
Magnificent property, set on 10 great acres to suit horses or a variety of other uses. Made road frontage, just 10 mins to Cranbourne and a short drive to Berwick. High quality Edwardian style home built to high quality standards. Both formal and informal living areas are spacious, the kitchen is equipped with a fabulous scullery, well fitted study, master bedroom with great ensuite and walk-in robe, remaining 2 bedrooms also have walk-in robes. With superb views from every window and extras that include gas log fire, gas ducted heating, alarm system, double garage with internal access. Outside there is 9 superb paddocks all beautifully fenced and divided with laneways, 7 loose boxes plus fantastic horse accommodation consisting of 4 stables with
s/s feeders, tack room and workshop / float storage all in as new condition. Add to this masses of water supply, large dam, excellent grazing pastures and electric gated entry.

Description:
Peace and Tranquility
Set in the most sought after township of Clyde is this fantastic family home. Set on approx 1000m2 offering room for the whole family. Featuring elegant sunken formal lounge, separate formal dining, great size well equipped kitchen and spacious family room. Add 4 bedrooms with full ensuite to master and your whole family is catered for. Outside will be the centre of your entertaining. Paved entertaining areas, covered spa, decking, bbq area and a large well established yard completes the picture.
Also features ducted heating, air conditioning and dishwasher. Come experience the lifestyle in the original Clyde township just minutes Cranbourne central with primary school nearby.

Description:
THE PERFECT FAMILY HOME
CLYDE NORTH - RAMLEGH SPRINGS: Situated in a quiet yet very much sought-after location is this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to secure this beautifully constructed home in Ramlegh Springs. Built by Metricon, the vendors have spared nothing in providing absolutely all the comforts one would want in a home of this caliber.
With a family friendly floor-plan and so much on offer, you will be spoiled for choice the moment you walk through the front door of this home. A grand facade to greet you on arrival, this home has been impeccably built with a lot of consideration to family living.
Sitting proudly on 448 square meters, you will surely be thrilled to call this home. The master bedroom comes with a full ensuite, a walk-in robe, double vanities as well a double-sized shower. The remaining bedrooms are spacious and come with huge built-in robes.
The central focal point of this home would have to be the kitchen, this is where it all happens. Caesar stone bench tops, tiled splash back, walk-in pantry, are just some of the highlights of this kitchen, not to miss the quality kitchen appliances on offer, all of this over-looking the open plan dining and living area.
If entertaining is what you'd like to indulge in then the huge alfresco would surely be a hit, with well manicured gardens at the back and a fully fenced backyard to keep those kids and pets safe. In addition, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down lights, high ceilings, are just some of the extras this home has on offer.
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
DISCLAIMERS:
Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information, however it does not constitute any representation by the vendor, agent or agency.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
Due to private buyer inspections, the status of the sale may change prior to pending Open Homes. As a result, we suggest you confirm the listing status before inspecting.
ADDED INTERNAL/EXTERNAL FEATURES INCLUDE:
- Built in 2017 - METRICON HOMES
- Open Plan Living
- Open Plan Dining
- Formal Living/Theatre
- Study Nook
- Master FES/WIR
- Double Vanities
- Double-sized shower
- 900mm cooktop
- 900mm oven
- Microwave oven
- Dishwasher
- Walk-in pantry
- Laundry room
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative Cooling
- Solar Panel - Hot Water
- Alfresco
- High Ceilings
- Down lights
- Side Access
- Garden Shed
Internal area
186m²

Description:
ABSOLUTELY STUNNING ENTERTAINER WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE TO ALKIRA
INSPECTIONS BY APPOINTMENT - PLEASE CONTACT AGENT.
Found in the prestigious 'The Eve' estate sits this amazing Four-bedroom home ideally suited for growing families who are not looking to compromise on quality or location. There is plenty to love about this home from the countless upgrades throughout, clever floor plan and designer details this one is sure to impress the most meticulous of buyers!
Features include:
Gorgeous Master suite feature pendant lights, his/hers walk in robes and en-suite with all the upgrades twin vanities with heaps of storage, 20mm stone benches, floor to ceiling tiles, semi frame less walk in shower with rainwater roof fitting and shower niche
Three further spacious bedrooms two with built in robes
One large living area to enjoy plus a welcoming open plan family/ dining area PLUS a separate large rumpus or theatre room
Stunning designer kitchen with all the bells and whistles that looks like it's straight from a magazine upgrades include 40mm stone waterfall bench tops, 900mm freestanding oven with gas cook-top, HUGE walk in pantry, glass splash back, multiple pot draws, breakfast bar and heaps of cupboard/ bench space.
Indoor and outdoor living blend seamlessly with bi fold doors opening up to an undercover decked alfresco overlooking the low maintenance backyard
Double garage with internal access to the home
576M2 block means no compromise on space
Long list of EXTRAS include: Ducted heating and evaporative cooling, gorgeous feature gas fireplace to living area, impressive double door entrance leading to widened hallway upon entry, down lights throughout, multiple linen cupboards for storage, carpets to all bedrooms and tiles to the rest of the home, landscaped gardens to both back and front, colour bond fencing the list goes on!
This luxurious home is ideally situated in a family-friendly location ripe for its new owners to take advantage of. ALKIRA Secondary College and Berwick Springs Rec Reserve/ playground are both less than a minute walk away! Transport is a breeze with easy access to public transport and the M1 close by and for shopping your local IGA is only a short drive away offering a supermarket as well as other speciality stores.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions in the content and photos are approximate only. *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS*
Due diligence check list:
http://www.consumer.vic

Description:
Rare opportunity for First Home Buyers and Investors!
Nestled on a generous 650m2 (approx) block in a near central location of Cranbourne, this property offers you a great opportunity to make an important investment in your future. It's only a short walk from local schools, shops and 5 minute's drive to Cranbourne station & Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre.
This fully renovated, well-built brick house leaves investors or owners to do nothing to make it your home.
- Opportunity to sub-divide(STCA)
- 3 Bedrooms, 1Bath.
- Big Lounge.
- Separate Dining.
- Ducted Heating and Evaporative Cooling.
- Large storage shed and Big Backyard.
- Outdoor Area.
- Security Window Rolling Shutters.
- Security Alarm & NBN.
- Separately built generous size kids day care / entertaining area.

Description:
A B-I-G, B-I-G block
Endless opportunities exist with this solid 4 bedroom property. Boasting huge backyard suitable for pool, granny flat or even your very own footy ground. Offering long & wide driveway so you could easily accommodate even more cars off the street. The driveway leads you to a double garage equipped with remote and rear access.
Other features including:
- Master bedroom with full ensuite & walk in robe
- Hostess kitchen with brand new dishwasher, gas cooktop and wall oven
- Ducted heating, evaporative cooling & skylight
- Genuine pine flooring in main living area, tiles in wet areas and carpet in bedrooms & lounge
- Low maintenance garden at the front and the back is a blank canvas
- plus many more additional features
Perfected located with all amenities only a short walk away this includes Courtenay Garden Primary School, Lyndhurst Secondary College, Merinda Park railway station and Thompson Park & Springhill Shopping Centres.
Please contact me quickly for a private viewing or miss out.

Description:
Available Now For Private Inspections!
Sitting in a prime location, within the popular Delaray Estate, is this quality designer-built home that embraces all aspects of lifestyle, specked up for family living and friendly entertaining. Surrounded by parklands, this perfect family home is ready for you to move in and to call it your own.
Beyond the eye-catching and modern facade lies the approx. 28 squares of magnificently executed finishes and display home quality fittings, with ample garage for two vehicles and/or additional trailers, vans and larger sized vehicles. Included within is an impeccable master suite with his and her robes, vanity and shower located away from the master are three additional bedrooms all with BIR's.
Special to this home is the outstanding theatre/rumpus room that is ready for you to plug and play, relax and watch the footy or a Rocky marathon...whichever you desire. The open plan design offers a stunning functional kitchen that leads through the triple stacked sliders to the ultimate alfresco entertaining area. Whether you're celebrating a mate's birthday or simply hosting a family BBQ, the outdoor area makes it easy with upgraded Blackbutt hardwood flooring, gas built in BBQ and outdoor power supply that makes everyone want to come back to 18 Deoro Parade.
Extra inclusions within the property that serve for the ultimate comfort include the Toshiba Refrigerated Cycle Cassette System and double-glazed windows, which ensures cool nights are warm and warm nights are cool.
For the buyer that craves perfection and quality, all whilst being situated in one of the most sought-after positions within Clyde, this home must be inspected today.

Description:
A Place to Call Home
Take a look at this spacious family home situated in the ever sought-after Hunt Club Estate, featuring a winning floor plan, Other Special Features include:
- Four Bedrooms
- Full Ensuite with spa bath and Walk in Robe to Master Bedroom
- Spacious Kitchen includes Dishwasher
- Formal Lounge
- Family Room and Meals Area
- Rumpus Room
- Ducted Heating
- Split System Cooling
- Double Lock Up Garage with Remote and Rear Roller Door Access
- 576m2 Allotment
COVID-19:
Preventative Hygiene Protocols:
Please do not enter any of our properties:
1. If you are feeling unwell
2. If you have just returned from overseas or have been in close contact with a confirmed case of COVID-19 in the last 14 days
3. Supplied disposable gloves must be worn at all inspections
4. Facemasks Must be worn & hand sanitizer will be provided
5. Inspections must be no longer than 15 minutes - a return trip must be within a 2 hour period
6. One agent and one buyer who may be accompanied by one other person from an existing household or an intimate partner and children under 18 years of old if no appropriate alternative care can be arranged.
Within a short walk to Hunt Club Village Shopping Centre, Local Parks and Bus Stops, centrally located to Cranbourne Shopping Centre and both Cranbourne & Merinda train lines. Call to arrange your inspection today.
*Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our Rental Department has appraised this property at $390 p/w ($1,695 pcm) for more details about leasing contact our department today on 03 9705 3000.

Description:
A Real Beauty for the Tradies, with Massive Shedding
Adjoining a park reserve, on a 660m2 block, in a lovely quiet location, this gorgeous well built solid brick, double storey 4 bedroom plus study home oozes charm and appeal with its olde world style and offers someone an abundance of shedding, making it ideal for a tradie, someone with a boat and/or caravan or a small truck.
Off the lovely formal entry, the home features a cosy formal lounge room with timber floors and a wood heater that also flows through to the bright dining area. The fresh and bright kitchen with a dishwasher looks out onto the big backyard and the fenced in ground pool, gazebo and paved verandah. Also downstairs is a large bedroom with robes, the large laundry and a WC.
Upstairs, you will find the enormous master bedroom which could also be used as another living area for the kids to enjoy with a separate study or retreat adjoining, and also opens out onto the balcony that offers views through to the Dandenongs. There are also another 2 double bedrooms with robes and a gorgeous fully tiled bathroom plus another separate WC to service upstairs.
Letâs not forget the ducted heating throughout, the massive shedding that includes a high clearance open garage (9m x 6.5m x 3.2m), the double remote garage (9m x 6m) converted to a man cave for the boys, with wood heating and a bar and finally all the extra driveway parking.
All of this is in close proximity to Woolworths, cafes, take away foods, Bunnings, train stations, buses, parks, sporting grounds, Schools and Kindergartens and only a 5 minute drive to the Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre and finally, within easy access to both the City and Bays.
A gorgeous home that offers plenty, come see for yourself.

Description:
Fresh & Tidy In A Sought-After Estate
Near-new and full of appeal, this modern 4-bedroom family home is located in the fantastic Parks Edge Estate amongst all that Cranbourne East has to offer!
Enjoy an active lifestyle with easy access to Casey RACE and Casey Fields sporting complex, as well as Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, local schools and so much more.
This bright layout features a large spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, ample cabinetry and a wide island benchtop overlooking open plan living and meals areas all extending out to a cosy covered patio for alfresco entertaining.
The master bedroom is privately positioned at the front of the home with its own ensuite and walk-in wardrobe, while the 3 additional bedrooms include built-in wardrobes and are serviced by a central bathroom with a separate toilet and laundry.
Landscaped front and rear yards keep this 325m2 block neat and tidy, with the remote lock-up double garage providing both rear and internal access to the home.
This is an ideal choice for first home buyers and those looking for low maintenance living, while the astute investor can take advantage of a month to month lease at $420 per week.
Contact Peter Demos 0490 051 760 to find out more about this property!
Features
- Ducted Heating
- Split System Air Con
- Plenty Of Storage Throughout

- You cannot travel between Melbourne and regional Victoria for property inspections

Description:
Brand New Modern sleek Home !!!
**PLEASE CALL FOR PRIVATE INSPECTION**
A blissfully quiet locale provides the ideal setting for this single-level sensation delivering a lifestyle of easy living in the thriving suburb of Clyde North. With immaculate presentation, spacious interiors and an array of upgraded fixtures and fittings throughout, this sophisticated family home is bound to impress anyone who inspect it.
Modern, fresh and light filled interior, a front master bedroom with walk-in wardrobe & ensuite with double vanity, three more bedrooms with built-in robes, a main bathroom, a formal lounge, an open plan expansive living/dining finished with well appointed kitchen which includes 900mm stainless steel five burner cooktop & oven, 40mm stone bench top and walk-in pantry.
Your new home comes with following inclusions
- LED Downlights throughout the house
- Floor boards to hallway, lounge, living, dining and kitchen
- Quality carpets to bedrooms
- 900mm Five burner cook top and oven
- Stone benchtops throughout the house
- 40mm Stone benchtop to kitchen
- Glass splash-back
- Pendant lights to kitchen
- Walk in pantry
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative cooling
- Remote double lockup garage with internal access to house
Your new home is in walking distance to
- future supermarket, medical centre, gym, restaurant and cafes
and Short drive to
- Bunnings on Clyde
- Future Berwick town centre
- Hillcrest College
- Rivercrest Christian College
- Avenue Shopping Centre
- Grayling Primary School
- St Francis Xavier College (Berwick Campus)
- Berwick Chase Primary School
- Catherines Catholic Primary School
- Tulliallan Primary School
- Eden Rise Shopping Centre
- M1 Freeway access (Inbound and outbound)
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Call Ravi on 0444 522 762 or Dilshan 0402 696 602to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.
Insights: 35 CATTEES STREET, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2017 and 274 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.
